name: Simple Space Shooter (Mohamed Elmejrab)
description:
A straight forward prototype of a space shooter game, you get waves of asteroids which you can destroy to get the highest score possible.

Controls: W A S D to move, SPACE to shoot.

I created this prototype within the CE818 (High Level Games Development) module while studying MSc Computer Games at University of Essex.

I have done all the coding, however all visual/audio assets  were provided in the module by Dr. Katerina Bourazeri.
